4.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, night. Chandler and Joey are sharing the sofabed in the
living room. Joey is restless.

lines.Line: Just trying to get comfortable. I can't sleep in my underwear.

I've been thinking. Y'know, about how I'm always seeing girls on top of
girls..
Are they end to end, or tall like pancakes
Are they end to end, or tall like pancakes

Y'know what I mean, about how I'm always going out with all these women.
And I always figured, when the right one comes along, I'd be able to be a stand-up guy and
go the distance, y'know? Now I'm looking at my dad, thinking..

Hey, you're not him. You're you. When they were all over you to go

No. You decided to go into the out-of-work actor business. Now that

lines.Line:

It's, I mean, it's nothing, I'm fine. It's my friends. They-they have a
liking problem with you. In that, um, they don't

But they don't see all the wonderfulness that I see. They don't see all

Well, I'm not I'm not at all surprised they feel that way
You're not? See, that's why you're so great!
You're not? See, that's why you're so great!

Actually it's, it's quite, y'know, typical behaviour when you have this
kind of dysfunctional group dynamic. Y'know, this kind of co-dependant, emotionally
stunted, sitting in your stupid coffee house with your stupid big cups which, I'm sorry,
